5146  if (ImGui::BeginMenu("Open", open_count < app.Documents.Size))
5147  {
5148  for (int doc_n = 0; doc_n < app.Documents.Size; doc_n++)
5149  {
5150  MyDocument* doc = &app.Documents[doc_n];
5151  if (!doc->Open)
5152  if (ImGui::MenuItem(doc->Name))
5153  doc->DoOpen();
5154  }
5155  ImGui::EndMenu();
5156  }
5157  if (ImGui::MenuItem("Close All Documents", NULL, false, open_count > 0))
5158  for (int doc_n = 0; doc_n < app.Documents.Size; doc_n++)
5159  app.Documents[doc_n].DoQueueClose();
5160  if (ImGui::MenuItem("Exit", "Alt+F4")) {}
5161  ImGui::EndMenu();
5162  }
5163  ImGui::EndMenuBar();
5164  }
5165 
5166  // [Debug] List documents with one checkbox for each
5167  for (int doc_n = 0; doc_n < app.Documents.Size; doc_n++)
5168  {
5169  MyDocument* doc = &app.Documents[doc_n];
5170  if (doc_n > 0)
5171  ImGui::SameLine();
5172  ImGui::PushID(doc);
5173  if (ImGui::Checkbox(doc->Name, &doc->Open))
5174  if (!doc->Open)
5175  doc->DoForceClose();
5176  ImGui::PopID();
5177  }
5178 
5179  ImGui::Separator();
5180 
5181  // Submit Tab Bar and Tabs
5182  {
5183  ImGuiTabBarFlags tab_bar_flags = (opt_fitting_flags) | (opt_reorderable ? ImGuiTabBarFlags_Reorderable : 0);
5184  if (ImGui::BeginTabBar("##tabs", tab_bar_flags))
5185  {
5186  if (opt_reorderable)
5187  NotifyOfDocumentsClosedElsewhere(app);
5188 
5189  // [DEBUG] Stress tests
5190  //if ((ImGui::GetFrameCount() % 30) == 0) docs[1].Open ^= 1; // [DEBUG] Automatically show/hide a tab. Test various interactions e.g. dragging with this on.
5191  //if (ImGui::GetIO().KeyCtrl) ImGui::SetTabItemSelected(docs[1].Name); // [DEBUG] Test SetTabItemSelected(), probably not very useful as-is anyway..
5192 
5193  // Submit Tabs
5194  for (int doc_n = 0; doc_n < app.Documents.Size; doc_n++)
5195  {
5196  MyDocument* doc = &app.Documents[doc_n];
5197  if (!doc->Open)
5198  continue;
5199 
5200  ImGuiTabItemFlags tab_flags = (doc->Dirty ? ImGuiTabItemFlags_UnsavedDocument : 0);
5201  bool visible = ImGui::BeginTabItem(doc->Name, &doc->Open, tab_flags);
5202 
5203  // Cancel attempt to close when unsaved add to save queue so we can display a popup.
5204  if (!doc->Open && doc->Dirty)
5205  {
5206  doc->Open = true;
5207  doc->DoQueueClose();
5208  }
5209 
5210  MyDocument::DisplayContextMenu(doc);
5211  if (visible)
5212  {
5213  MyDocument::DisplayContents(doc);
5214  ImGui::EndTabItem();
5215  }
5216  }
5217 
5218  ImGui::EndTabBar();
5219  }
5220  }
5221 
5222  // Update closing queue
5223  static ImVector<MyDocument*> close_queue;
5224  if (close_queue.empty())
5225  {
5226  // Close queue is locked once we started a popup
5227  for (int doc_n = 0; doc_n < app.Documents.Size; doc_n++)
5228  {
5229  MyDocument* doc = &app.Documents[doc_n];
5230  if (doc->WantClose)
5231  {
5232  doc->WantClose = false;
5233  close_queue.push_back(doc);
5234  }
5235  }
5236  }
5237 
5238  // Display closing confirmation UI
5239  if (!close_queue.empty())
5240  {
5241  int close_queue_unsaved_documents = 0;
5242  for (int n = 0; n < close_queue.Size; n++)
5243  if (close_queue[n]->Dirty)
5244  close_queue_unsaved_documents++;
5245 
5246  if (close_queue_unsaved_documents == 0)
5247  {
5248  // Close documents when all are unsaved
5249  for (int n = 0; n < close_queue.Size; n++)
5250  close_queue[n]->DoForceClose();
5251  close_queue.clear();
5252  }
5253  else
5254  {
5255  if (!ImGui::IsPopupOpen("Save?"))
5256  ImGui::OpenPopup("Save?");
5257  if (ImGui::BeginPopupModal("Save?"))
5258  {
5259  ImGui::Text("Save change to the following items?");
5260  ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(-1.0f);
5261  if (ImGui::ListBoxHeader("##", close_queue_unsaved_documents, 6))
5262  {
5263  for (int n = 0; n < close_queue.Size; n++)
5264  if (close_queue[n]->Dirty)
5265  ImGui::Text("%s", close_queue[n]->Name);
5266  ImGui::ListBoxFooter();
5267  }
5268 
5269  if (ImGui::Button("Yes", ImVec2(80, 0)))
5270  {
5271  for (int n = 0; n < close_queue.Size; n++)
5272  {
5273  if (close_queue[n]->Dirty)
5274  close_queue[n]->DoSave();
5275  close_queue[n]->DoForceClose();
5276  }
5277  close_queue.clear();
5278  ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
5279  }
5280  ImGui::SameLine();
5281  if (ImGui::Button("No", ImVec2(80, 0)))
5282  {
5283  for (int n = 0; n < close_queue.Size; n++)
5284  close_queue[n]->DoForceClose();
5285  close_queue.clear();
5286  ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
5287  }
5288  ImGui::SameLine();
5289  if (ImGui::Button("Cancel", ImVec2(80, 0)))
5290  {
5291  close_queue.clear();
5292  ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
5293  }
5294  ImGui::EndPopup();
5295  }
5296  }
5297  }
5298 
5299  ImGui::End();
5300 }
5301 
5302 // End of Demo code
5303 #else
5304 
5305 void ImGui::ShowAboutWindow(bool*) {}
5306 void ImGui::ShowDemoWindow(bool*) {}
5307 void ImGui::ShowUserGuide() {}
5308 void ImGui::ShowStyleEditor(ImGuiStyle*) {}
5309 
5310 #endif
5311 
5312 #endif // #ifndef IMGUI_DISABLE
